Title: Roe v. Wade, The Musical
Plot:
Alan takes on one of his most controversial cases to date when he represents a man suing Missy Tiggs for stealing his sperm and impregnating herself to have a black baby.

Meanwhile, Jerry has mixed feelings when Leigh asks him to help her get her job back after she's fired for hugging a student.
GuestStars: Jere Burns, Aaron D. Spears, Roma Maffia, Tom Kemp, Elizabeth Dennehy
